TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content: Most black hair, like mine, actually has a slight blue tone. The blue colour I dye it is far from natural, obviously, but everyone whose opinion I care about like it, so whatever.

Moderator down, I repeat, moderator down!

We need those defibrillators STAT!
I take it my opinion doesn't matter?

Haha, that sounds like a fun nickname to have

If you miss your red streak, why not start doing it again?

Financial reasons. Also, I kinda love my hair as it is and I don't wanna screw it up. Right now, it's long and wavy and silky soft and a beautiful golden blonde... With my luck, one application of dye and I end up with straw...

i would dye my hair, but i would dye it ginger and it already is ginger so i don't see the point in dyeing my hair a slightly different shade that it is now and i think i would love to have green highlights (just wait until i am self-dependant then i shall have my way)

As a boy, I never really considered dying my hair. But as long as it looks natural (blue is NOT a natural hair color!), I guess it can look good on girls.

Hey now, I'm sure it looks very nice on Satcharna.

@Trekkette - Yeah I guess that's as good a reason as any.

I take it my opinion doesn't matter?

We're like the cantina in Star Wars. We don't like droids.

We're like the cantina in Star Wars. We don't like droids.

But I'm not completely a Droid!

robot=droid

kapesh?
Also, "Cyborg" is the root of "Borg" whose opinions are never sought, lest one lose their distinctiveness.
But I am not the Borg. And resistance isn't futile.
"We are the Borg. Resistance is futile" How about that advice?
And we're not completely a cantina.

And we're not completely a cantina.

Says you

*proceeds to imbibe adult beverages*

Says you

*proceeds to imbibe adult beverages*

Hey, that stuffs bad for you!

But I am not the Borg. And resistance isn't futile.

*shoots you with a phaser* *you die* good point there

It only seems bad for you. Just don' have it in excess.

@redwolfie: ow! That stung!
Trust me, feeling the way I do is bad for me too. I'll take alcohol poisoning over this any day...
*tries vodka* *is sick all over the ground* WTF?? this tastes disgusting

I've never liked bars...

I might see the meaning in it being a place to hang out with your friends,

or try to engage conversation with the opposite sex.

But nothing else, just seems like a place to deprive yourself of your senses, and I'm not really into that.

Trust me, feeling the way I do is bad for me too. I'll take alcohol poisoning over this any day...

*therapist mode* whaaat happened?

Trust me, feeling the way I do is bad for me too. I'll take alcohol poisoning over this any day...

How about cute kitten gifs?

Trust me, feeling the way I do is bad for me too. I'll take alcohol poisoning over this any day...

Oh I don't need to trust you, I know myself about those feels.

Still, I hate drinking. Comes from having a borderline alcoholic mother, I suppose.

*therapist mode* whaaat happened?
Short version: my boyfriend ended our relationship, but still wants to be friends. Meanwhile, I'm still deeply in love with him.

Short version: my boyfriend ended our relationship, but still wants to be friends. Meanwhile, I'm still deeply in love with him.

Well at least he hasn't tried to kill you, like one of my exes.
